ALIRAJPUR

The alirajpur village is the South_West side of Madhya Pradesh state in India. Using the cense of 2011 we have created map of 2 blocks in alirajpur district they are katti wadda and alirajpur. The below figure shows the villages in this two block and total there are 197 of them.

library(readxl)
rdata_full <- read_excel("rdata_full.xls")
library(leaflet)
rdata_full%>%
  leaflet()%>%
   addTiles()%>%
  addMarkers(popup = rdata_full$Name)
## Assuming "long" and "lat" are longitude and latitude, respectively

Clustering of the villages.

library(leaflet)
rdata_full %>%
  leaflet()%>%
   addTiles()%>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
## Assuming "long" and "lat" are longitude and latitude, respectively

The populatation of Girla in between 6-14 are shown.

library(leaflet)
rdata_full %>%
  leaflet()%>%
   addTiles()%>%
  addCircles(weight = 1, radius =5*rdata_full$populatation_girl)%>%
  addLegend(labels = "villages",colors = "blue")
## Assuming "long" and "lat" are longitude and latitude, respectively
